name: mcp-docs-server
description: Lightweight MCP server for local documentation access and search
long_description: MCP Docs Server provides direct access to your local documentation files. It reads markdown files and exposes their contents through powerful search and overview tools. Perfect for maintaining project documentation, technical specs, and knowledge bases accessible to AI assistants.
